content:
Sounds like a plan! I'm sure Maria will be thrilled to sub in for Alex's class. Just make sure to give her all the necessary details, such as the class format, any specific exercises or routines you'd like her to cover, and any notes on the students' levels or needs.

It's great that you're thinking ahead and finding a solution to ensure your students have a great workout experience. I'm sure Maria will do an amazing job, and your students will appreciate the energy and enthusiasm she brings to the class.

Let me know how it goes, and if there's anything else I can help you with!
